subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|麻縄|あさなわ}}: [[hempen]] [[rope]]
* {{ja-r|麻布|^あざぶ}}: [[w:Azabu, Tokyo|Azabu]], an area in [[w:Minato, Tokyo|Minato ward, Tokyo]]
* {{ja-r|麻雀|まあじゃん}}: [[mahjong]]
* {{ja-r|麻疹|ましん}}, {{ja-r|麻疹|はしか}}: [[measles]]
* {{ja-r|麻酔|ますい}}: [[anesthesia]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|麻痺|まひ}}: [[paralysis]]
* {{ja-r|麻薬|まやく}}: [[drug]]
* {{ja-r|大麻|たいま}}: [[marijuana]]
* {{ja-r|胡麻|ごま}}: [[sesame]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|あさ}}

# [[hemp]]
#* c. '''800''': ''Shibunritsu Ongi'' (page 47)
#*: 麻衣 '''阿佐'''衣
# [[flax]]
# [[linen]]

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|そ|yomi=k}}
Possibly from an altered pronunciation of ''asa''.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ま}}

# The hemp plant.
# The [[bark]] of the hemp plant.
# [[thread|Thread]], [[yarn]], or [[cloth]] made from the hemp fiber. Used in the past for mourning clothes in China.
